headline.main: Georgia Teacher to Retire After Blasting Obama to Students
headline.print_headline: Georgia Teacher to Retire After Blasting Obama to Students

docs.snippet: A central Georgia middle school teacher who criticized President Barack Obama and his supporters in front of students has been removed from the classroom, pending her upcoming retirement....
docs.lead_paragraph: A central Georgia middle school teacher who criticized President Barack Obama and his supporters in front of students has been removed from the classroom, pending her upcoming retirement.

headline.main: Twenty Officers Injured So Far in Baltimore Unrest-Police
headline.print_headline: Twenty Officers Injured So Far in Baltimore Unrest-Police

docs.snippet: The number of police officers injured so far in civil unrest in Baltimore has risen to 20, Captain John Kowalczyk of the Baltimore City Police Department said on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The number of police officers injured so far in civil unrest in Baltimore has risen to 20, Captain John Kowalczyk of the Baltimore City Police Department said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Fiancée Chronicles Love, Life With Man Who Died of Ebola in Texas
headline.print_headline: Fiancée Chronicles Love, Life With Man Who Died of Ebola in Texas

docs.snippet: Thomas Eric Duncan became the face of a crisis when he was diagnosed with Ebola in the United States, but he was simply "Eric" to his fiancee, Louise Troh, who said she has endured threats and battled nightmares since his death in October....
docs.lead_paragraph: Thomas Eric Duncan became the face of a crisis when he was diagnosed with Ebola in the United States, but he was simply "Eric" to his fiancee, Louise Troh, who said she has endured threats and battled nightmares since his death in October.

headline.main: Obama says U.S. - Japan alliance not a provocation to China
headline.sub: Obama says U.S. - Japan alliance not a provocation to China

docs.snippet: U.S. President Barack Obama has told a news conference that a strong alliance with Japan should not be seen as a provocation to China while Japan's PM Abe says the relationship is "indispensible" to world peace. Rough Cut (no reporter narration)....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. President Barack Obama has told a news conference that a strong alliance with Japan should not be seen as a provocation to China while Japan's PM Abe says the relationship is "indispensible" to world peace. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).

headline.main: U.S., Allies Conduct 20 Air Strikes in Syria, Iraq - Military
headline.print_headline: U.S., Allies Conduct 20 Air Strikes in Syria, Iraq - Military

docs.snippet: U.S.-led forces targeted Islamic State militants in Syria with four air strikes from Monday to Tuesday morning and conducted another 16 strikes against the group in Iraq, the U.S. military said on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S.-led forces targeted Islamic State militants in Syria with four air strikes from Monday to Tuesday morning and conducted another 16 strikes against the group in Iraq, the U.S. military said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Plaintiffs, supporters of historic gay marriage case gather at Supreme Court steps
headline.sub: Plaintiffs, supporters of historic gay marriage case gather at Supreme Court steps

docs.snippet: The plaintiffs in a potentially historic court battle over legalizing gay marriage gather on the steps of the U.S. Supreme Court after the court hears oral arguments. Rough Cut (no reporter narration)....
docs.lead_paragraph: The plaintiffs in a potentially historic court battle over legalizing gay marriage gather on the steps of the U.S. Supreme Court after the court hears oral arguments. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).

headline.main: Renee Fleming's Madcap 'Living on Love' Play to Close May 3
headline.print_headline: Renee Fleming's Madcap 'Living on Love' Play to Close May 3

docs.snippet: With no love from the Tony Awards nominating committee, the play "Living on Love" will close May 3....
docs.lead_paragraph: With no love from the Tony Awards nominating committee, the play "Living on Love" will close May 3.

headline.main: UN Renews Western Sahara Force Without Changes Africans Wanted
headline.print_headline: UN Renews Western Sahara Force Without Changes Africans Wanted

docs.snippet: The United Nations Security Council renewed for another year the U.N. peacekeeping mission in the disputed North African territory of Western Sahara but failed to accept African Union recommendations for changes to the force's mandate....
docs.lead_paragraph: The United Nations Security Council renewed for another year the U.N. peacekeeping mission in the disputed North African territory of Western Sahara but failed to accept African Union recommendations for changes to the force's mandate.
